mdException.name: gov.geoplatform.uasdm.bus.InvalidPasswordException
mdException.label: Invalid Password
mdException.description: Thrown when a user enters a password which does not conform to the spec.
mdException.message: The password must be at least 14 characters in length and must contain at least: Two uppercase letters [A-Z], two lowercase letters [a-z], two digits [0-9], and two special characters [e.g.: !@#$*&]
